attributes.action: Allow Ukrainian refugees to enter the UK without a visa
attributes.additional_details: Russia is invading Ukraine, and Ukrainian citizens are fleeing for their lives. Allowing citizens of Ukraine to enter without a visa is the bare minimum that the UK government should do to aid Ukrainian citizen's safety
attributes.background: The government should temporarily exempt Ukrainian citizens from needing a visa to enter the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
